pull.title: BIP-345: withdraw
pull.body: This proposal has basically been replaced by #1793. See https://delvingbitcoin.org/t/withdrawing-op-vault-bip-345/1670 for rationale.

events.body: The CI is failing because of the color of the table row in the README.mediawiki

verification.payload:
tree 4343c79eab7f3b11231dc90f1e9069b36e9dc7a0
parent 3365fb7a7e5e25b95b94d65808e32a02aa684aaa
author James O'Beirne <james.obeirne@pm.me> 1746545987 -0400
committer Murch <murch@murch.one> 1746729211 -0700

BIP-345: withdraw

events.body: Edited with permission of @jamesob to fix CI issue. Checked with @instagibbs out-of-band who supports the change.

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -5,7 +5,7 @@
   Author: James O'Beirne <vaults@au92.org>
           Greg Sanders <gsanders87@gmail.com>
   Comments-URI: https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/wiki/Comments:BIP-0345
-  Status: Draft
+  Status: Withdrawn
comments.body: The README would need updating as well.

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -5,7 +5,7 @@
   Author: James O'Beirne <vaults@au92.org>
           Greg Sanders <gsanders87@gmail.com>
   Comments-URI: https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/wiki/Comments:BIP-0345
-  Status: Draft
+  Status: Withdrawn
comments.body:
Probably a diff like this

```diff
diff --git a/README.mediawiki b/README.mediawiki
index fe3be265..2ea96ed3 100644
--- a/README.mediawiki
+++ b/README.mediawiki
@@ -1127,13 +1127,13 @@ Standard
 | Final
-|-
+|- style="background-color: #ffcfcf"
 | [[bip-0345.mediawiki|345]]
 | Consensus (soft fork)
 | OP_VAULT
 | James O'Beirne, Greg Sanders
 | Standard
-| Draft
+| Withdrawn
 |-
 | [[bip-0347.mediawiki|347]]
 | Consensus (soft fork)
```

@@ -5,7 +5,7 @@
   Author: James O'Beirne <vaults@au92.org>
           Greg Sanders <gsanders87@gmail.com>
   Comments-URI: https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/wiki/Comments:BIP-0345
-  Status: Draft

comments.body: Based on your comment, you may also want to add `Superseded-By: [bip-number-of-OP_CCV-coming-soon]` below the Post-History header.

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -5,7 +5,7 @@

           Greg Sanders <gsanders87@gmail.com>
   Comments-URI: https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/wiki/Comments:BIP-0345
-  Status: Draft
+  Status: Withdrawn

@@ -1133,7 +1133,7 @@ Those proposing changes should consider that ultimately consent may rest with th
 | OP_VAULT
 | James O'Beirne, Greg Sanders
 | Standard
-| Draft
+| Withdrawn
comments.body:
Line 1130 should be

|- style="background-color: #ffcfcf"

to match the status change.

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -5,7 +5,8 @@
   Author: James O'Beirne <vaults@au92.org>
           Greg Sanders <gsanders87@gmail.com>
   Comments-URI: https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/wiki/Comments:BIP-0345
-  Status: Draft
+  Status: Withdrawn
+  Superseded-By: 443
comments.body: Please move the Superseded-By header below the Post-History header. The headers are [required to be in a specific order](https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/blob/master/bip-0002.mediawiki#bip-header-preamble).
